about.title: About Us ?
about.description-story: The idea of Nabdah Khair emerged from the need for a reliable platform that combines ease of donation with clear impact, after observing the difficulty in accessing documented cases and the lack of clarity in donation paths in many initiatives.
about.our-story: Nabdah Khair was founded with the aim of
about.des-story: Since its launch, the platform has sought to be an effective humanitarian link between charity and its people.
about.description-mission: We look forward to a world where humanitarian aid is within reach of every willing hand to give, and where the result of every charitable impulse (Nabdah) is visible and tangible.
about.decrption-team: Behind every achievement at Nabdah Khair is an integrated team working with passion and dedication to achieve the platform's mission.

pageLinks.title: Browse Nabdah Khair Pages

Organizations.title: Most Popular Partner Foundations
Organizations.decrption: We are proud to partner with a group of leading, accredited organizations that work with us to support humanitarian cases and provide aid to those in need.

foundation-Details.timeline-description: A humanitarian journey that started with an idea and transformed into an entity serving the community
foundation-Details.PlatformStatistics-description: Numbers that reflect the real scale of impact and the community's role in supporting humanitarian cases.

services.title: Our Featured Services & Support Campaigns
services.decrption: We provide you with a range of services that meet your needs and help you achieve your charitable goals.

cases.title: Humanitarian Cases
cases.description: A collection of cases that need your support now. Each case is verified, with its data presented fully transparently, and you can contribute immediately.

Statistic-section.title: Statistics Section
Statistic-section.subtitle: Numbers That Make a Real Difference
Statistic-section.description: Through your support, Nabta Khair creates a tangible impact in the lives of thousands of beneficiaries daily.
Statistic-section.decrption1: Thousands of individuals have received support and assistance through Nabdah Khair across various humanitarian fields.
Statistic-section.decrption2: Millions in donations have been raised and transparently directed to support verified cases and campaigns
Statistic-section.decrption3: A growing network of accredited organizations working with us to create real and sustainable impact.
Statistic-section.decrption4: Dedicated volunteers contributing their time and effort to monitor cases and carry out field missions.
Statistic-section.decrption5: Individuals who received direct support through the platform.
Statistic-section.decrption6: Contributing daily to field verification and follow-up.
Statistic-section.decrption7: Treated or supported thanks to your contributions.
Statistic-section.decrption8: Verified and working with us to achieve a greater impact.

fqa.decrption: Here are the most common questions we receive, with clear answers to enhance your experience with us. If you don't find your question here, you can contact us directly.

contact.decrption: We have a team ready to answer your inquiries, suggestions, or support requests. Whether you're a donor, volunteer, or organization, we are here to help you.
contact.subject: Message type
contact.decrption-ourBranches: Reach us through the nearest branch ‚Äî we are always close to serve the community.

footer.title: About Nabdah Khair
footer.decrption: Nabdah Khair is a platform that aims to facilitate donations, track humanitarian cases, and support charitable organizations in a secure and transparent manner. Our goal is to make giving accessible to everyone.
